data.title: Game #34 -- Charlotte Bobcats @ Cleveland Cavaliers Game Night Open Thread
data.meta_description: 08/2009 NBA Preseason   @    13-22   27-6  January 7, 2009  Cleveland, OH  7:00 PM est Radio - WTAM / TV - FSN HD  Season Series - Cavs Lead 2-0  Probable starters:  Raymond Felton PG Mo Williams ...
data.text:
The Cavaliers have already beat the Bobcats twice this season, but this Bobcats team is slightly different after shipping Jason Richardson to Phoenix. They proved it last night by knocking off the Celtics in overtime. The Cavs need an impressive win heading into their game with the Celtics on Friday and catching the 'Cats on the back half of a back-to-back could be just what the doctor ordered.

Talk about the game here in the comments! They Auto-Refresh, bringing an awesome game night experience!
